benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/credits - Create a credit

covered: Valid payload scenarios: TC01, TC02, TC03, TC04 demonstrate creating credits with single/multiple items, with/without invoiceId, and autoCommit where applicable

Input validation coverage: tests for missing fields (TC12), malformed JSON (TC11), invalid accountId format (TC14), unsupported currency (TC15), invalid pluginProperty type (TC16), and positive amount handling (TC13)
Error handling for missing entities: account not found (TC08) and invoice not found (TC09)
Header/authorization handling: missing CreateBy header (TC10) and insufficient permissions (TC18)
Integration and plugin behavior: pluginProperty propagation (TC05, TC06), plugin system unavailable (TC28) and error (TC29)
Edge case handling: empty body (TC21), extra fields ignored (TC22), maximum credits boundary (TC23), large payloads (TC24), timeouts (TC25)
Stateful scenarios: environment with only account (TC26) and with existing credits/invoices (TC27)
Performance tests: response time under normal/peak load (TC32, TC33) and resource usage (TC34)
Accessibility: API documentation visibility (TC35) and basic usability
Security tests: SQL injection (TC19) and XSS (TC20)
gaps: Caching headers and caching validation (ETag/Cache-Control) are not tested
Rate limiting / throttling scenarios are not tested
Unauthorized without credentials (401) handling not explicitly tested beyond 403
Generic server error paths (500) not explicitly tested (e.g., database failure)
GET/Pagination related concerns are outside POST scope
recommendations: Add tests for caching headers (ETag, Cache-Control)
Add rate limiting tests and simulate concurrent bursts
Add explicit 500-level server error scenarios (DB failure, timeout) if applicable
Consider consolidating performance tests with realistic load and measurable thresholds
